description: Update a driver day adjustment plan
permissions: User must be an admin or a practical manager of the plan trucker.
side_effects: Updates a driver day adjustment plan.
validation_notes: An <id> argument is required. At least one of --content or --start-at must be provided; otherwise the CLI returns an error. --start-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp when provided. content is required by server validation when provided. The trucker relationship is create-only and cannot be changed on update.
